articles.title: Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant Wedding LIVE Updates: SRK-Gauri, Salman, Priyanka-Nick, Ranbir-Alia arrive - India Today
articles.description: Anant and Radhika Wedding Live Updates The wedding of the decade is finally here After months of lavish pre-wedding festivities that would make Gatsby blush Anant Ambani son of Asia039s richest man Mukesh Ambani will wed his sweetheart Radhika Merchant today …
articles.content: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant are all set to marry today, July 12, at the Jio World Convention Center in Mumbai. Touted as one of the biggest events the country will witness, the wedding will tak… [+720 chars]
